name: Hopper Gun, a UoG 2021 Games Jam Entry
name_original: Hopper Gun, a UoG 2021 Games Jam Entry
description:
An Entry for the 24 Hr 2021 University of Gloucestershire Games Jam,

The theme for this Games Jam was "Limited Capacity" and so, as fans of shooter games, we decided to design a gun that is limited by the fact that it has an open top hopper feed system... the bullet might just fall out if you aren't careful!

Navigate 2 levels, with dangerous enemies, such as BOMB MAN, KNIFE MAN and GUN MAN. Carefully keep your gun horizontal, and don't move too fast!

Luckily, the gun fires THE WHOLE BULLET! and so the bullets can be reused!

CONTROLS:

W A S D: Movement

Mouse: Look/Aim

Left Click: Shoot

Right Click (Hold): Slowly walk, makes bullets less likely to fall out!

E (Hold): Grab bullets (Can be held to grab multiple)

Alt F4 to close the game

You may have to use windows volume mixer to adjust volume!

The Green bar is health, the orange bar at the bottom is gun wobbliness, if it fills up bullets will spill out! Slow it down by looking forward to keep your gun level, and walk!

Created by Matt and Kai, Games Programming, and Games Design students respectively.

Voice Acted by Kai
